item.title: Alucinara
item.description: Overview Alucinara is a form of energy that pertains to the transfer of matter, thought, and other forms of energy between two or more realms.

item.title: Alucinara Gateways
item.description: Overview Alucinara gateways, shifts, and rifts are a phenomena characterised by the transferrence of matter and energy between two realms.

item.title: Cloud Gnats
item.description: Overview Cloud Gnats are animal-like apparitions made of aluciferous dust. They commonly appear as small animals, standing upright with their abdomen tapering off into a wispy tail.

item.title: Darkness
item.description: Overview Darkness is the physical manifestation of thought, allowing it to exist within the corporeal realms and outside of the dreamscape.

item.title: Soulstones
item.description: Overview Soulstones are objects made of asphalt which are used to contain souls after death. They are a common funerary keepsake in many cultures, and are often carved into shapes relevant to the life of whose soul they contain.

item.title: The Dreamscape
item.description: Overview The dreamscape is the only incorporeal realm. It is where matter, thought, and energy is stored without form, and can be retrieved through the use of alucinara to convert such things into physical form, within any of the corporeal realms.

item.title: Watchstones
item.description: Overview Watchstones are stones1 with eyes through which the Petrified Child sees, giving the deity a greater visual field and protecting those nearby from evil.
